trans-unit.source: The DirectoryContext class identifies a specific directory and the credentials that are used to access the directory.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DirectoryContext identifiserer en spesifikk mappe, og legitimasjonen som brukes til å få tilgang til mappen.

trans-unit.source: A directory context must be created before accessing the methods and properties of a System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory directory object such as a domain or forest.
trans-unit.target: En mappe kontekst må opprettes før du åpner metodene og egenskapene for en System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory directory-objekt som et domene eller en skog.

trans-unit.source: When creating a directory context, the process' current credentials or alternate credentials can be applied to that context by using the appropriate constructor.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en mappe kontekst, kan prosessens gjeldende informasjon eller informasjon for alternativ brukes på den konteksten ved å bruke riktig konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: These credentials determine the permissions that are in effect when the program accesses directory objects.
trans-unit.target: Legitimasjonen avgjør tillatelsene som er i bruk når programmet får tilgang til katalogobjekter.

trans-unit.source: Because Active Directory Domain Services objects might be protected against retrieval or modification by non-administrative users, the use of alternate credentials with permission to access the target objects is sometimes necessary for proper program functionality.
trans-unit.target: Fordi Active Directory Domain Services-objekter kan være beskyttet mot henting av eller endring av ikke-administrative brukere, er noen ganger bruk av alternativ legitimasjon med tillatelse til å få tilgang til målobjektene nødvendig for å installere programmet funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: The following table contains a list of the target types that are allowed and a description of the format of the target string.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder en liste over måltyper er tillatt og en beskrivelse av formatet på målstrengen.

trans-unit.source: |Target type|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> member|Target name format| |-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| |Domain Controller|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|The DNS name of the domain controller.| |AD LDS Instance|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|The DNS name of the AD LDS server and the LDAP port number, for example, ad_lds_instance.fabrikam.com:389.| |Domain|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|The DNS name of the domain, for example, sales.corp.fabrikam.com.| |Forest|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|The DNS name of the forest, for example, corp.fabrikam.com.| |Application Partition|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|The DNS name of the application partition.| |AD LDS Configuration Set|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>|One of the keywords that is associated with the service connection point registered by AD LDS instances for the configuration set.|
trans-unit.target: | Måltype | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>medlem | Target-navneformat | |-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| | Domenekontroller | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| DNS-navnet for domenekontrolleren. | | AD LDS forekomsten | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| DNS-navnet på AD LDS-serveren og LDAP-portnummer, for eksempel ad_lds_instance.fabrikam.com:389.| | Domenet | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| DNS-navnet til domenet, for eksempel sales.corp.fabrikam.com.| | Skog | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| DNS-navnet for skogen, for eksempel corp.fabrikam.com.| | Programmet partisjonen | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| DNS-navnet på programmet partisjonen. | | Konfigurasjon for AD LDS angitt | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>| Ett av nøkkelordene som er knyttet til tilkoblingspunktet for tjeneste registrert av AD LDS forekomster for av konfigurasjonssettet. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> class of the specified type that contains the credentials of the current user context.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> klassen til den angitte typen som inneholder legitimasjonen for gjeldende brukerkontekst.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> members that specifies the type of context to create.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> medlemmer som angir hvilken type konteksten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: For this constructor, the context type must be <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Context-typen må være for denne konstruktøren <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Other types of directory contexts cannot be created using this constructor because other types require a constructor that includes a parameter specifying the directory or target name.
trans-unit.target: Andre typer directory kontekster kan ikke opprettes med denne konstruktøren fordi andre typer krever en konstruktør som inneholder en parameter som angir navnet på mappen eller mål.

trans-unit.source: contextType is not valid.
trans-unit.target: contextTypeer ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: This class does not work on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen fungerer ikke på gjeldende plattform.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> class of the specified type that contains the specified name and the credentials of the current user context.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> klassen til den angitte typen som inneholder det angitte navnet og legitimasjonen for gjeldende brukerkontekst.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> members that specifies the type of context to create.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> medlemmer som angir hvilken type konteksten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The target of the directory context.
trans-unit.target: Målet for katalog-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: This string can take any of the formats defined in the Remarks section of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> topic.
trans-unit.target: Denne strengen kan ta noen av formatene som er definert i delen Merknader i den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> emnet.

trans-unit.source: name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: nameer ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: contextType is not valid.
trans-unit.target: contextTypeer ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: This class does not work on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen fungerer ikke på gjeldende plattform.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> class of the specified type that contains the specified user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> klassen til den angitte typen som inneholder den angitte brukernavnet og passordet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> members that specifies the type of context to create.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> medlemmer som angir hvilken type konteksten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: For this constructor, this parameter must be <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren må være for denne konstruktøren <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The user name to use for access.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet du bruker for å få tilgang.

trans-unit.source: The password to use for access.
trans-unit.target: Passordet som skal brukes for å få tilgang.

trans-unit.source: contextType is not valid.
trans-unit.target: contextTypeer ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: This class does not work on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen fungerer ikke på gjeldende plattform.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> class of the specified type that contains the specified target, user name, and password.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> klassen til den angitte typen som inneholder den angitte målet, brukernavn og passord.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> members that specifies the type of context to create.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> medlemmer som angir hvilken type konteksten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The target of the directory context.
trans-unit.target: Målet for katalog-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: This string can take any of the formats defined in the Remarks section of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> topic.
trans-unit.target: Denne strengen kan ta noen av formatene som er definert i delen Merknader i den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> emnet.

trans-unit.source: The user name to use for access.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet du bruker for å få tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the context object.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen context-objektet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"></xref> members that specifies the type of context.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContextType"> </xref> medlemmer som angir hvilken type kontekst.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the context.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The name of the context.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på konteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name of the context.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The user name to use for access by this context.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet du bruker for tilgang av denne konteksten.
